title: Drawing, "Design for a Desk Blotter", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, yellow color pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, upper right: 169.
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: SOUS-MAIN/CLOUTE VERMEIL 30 cms x 40 cms; right in graphite: [?] - sellier [cut off]; in black ink, lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/42.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Rectangular blotter, the two lower corners with rounded edges. The upper edge decorated with studs indicated in yellow color pencil to be executed in vermeil. To the right a small graphite drawing of the blotter in perspective.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Desk Blotter", ca. 1920–40.
ca. 1920–40. Pen and black ink, yellow color pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-8.
